sections.paragraphs: '''Alcidamas''' ({{lang-grc-gre|Ἀλκιδάμας}}), of [[Elaea (Aeolis)|Elaea]], in [[Aeolis]], [[ancient Greece|Greek]] [[sophist]] and [[rhetoric]]ian, flourished in the 4th century BC.
